gitCommitMessage:
Fix API routes for live deployment

- Removed 'output: export' from next.config.js to enable API routes
- Updated netlify.toml to use @netlify/plugin-nextjs for proper API handling
- Changed publish directory from 'out' to '.next' for server-side rendering
- This fixes 404 errors on /api/dashboard/save, /api/ai/smart-generate, etc.
